body: I Wish that this series were to become an Hentai anime series one day, Like Sarashi AI, Mitsudaku Kanojo, Innyuu Mazo Oyako, Ichigo Ichie, The Exhibitionist Play, Melty Maiden, Buta Musume No Oshigoto, and Sarashi na Koigokoro series! SERIOUSLY, THEY REALLY SHOULD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
After a million years, the man finally decided it was time
